author: travelandtourworld.com
title: San Diego Hotels Like Declan Suites Welcome Guests to the Top San Diego Events in SeptemberTravelandtourworld.com
text:
San Diego Hotels Like Declan Suites Welcome Guests to the Top San Diego Events in September Published on : Wednesday, August 26, 2015
Declan Suites and other San Diego Hotels welcome visitors who come to the City for the many popular San Diego events that take place in September. From fun events like the US Sand Sculpting Competition to professional meetings like the American Society for Microbiology, Declan Suites has special offers to welcome guests who come for these and other popular events.
San Diego Restaurant Week
September 20 through September 27, 2015
San Diego Restaurants offer everything from fabulous fine-dining experiences to the very best in casual fare. During San Diego Restaurant Week, locals and guests at San Diego Hotels can try some of the top restaurants at a great price. Nearly 150 restaurants will participate in the 2015 event. Restaurants will offer a 2-course lunch, a 3-course dinner, or both. Prices during this San Diego event vary by restaurant and a full list of options, including prices and menus, is available on the event website.
American Society for Microbiology International Conference on Antimicrobial Agents and Chemotherapy
September 17 through September 21, 2015
San Diego Convention Center | 111 Harbor Drive San Diego, CA 92101
Medical professionals from around the world will come to the City for this annual San Diego event. This conference includes courses and workshops, keynote speakers, and symposiums. Registration can be completed online. Various types of passes are available and prices range from $200 to $675 . The cost of workshops and symposiums are not included in registration.
US Sand Sculpting Challenge and 3D Art Expo
September 4 through September 7, 2015
1140 North Harbor Drive B Street Pier
This exciting San Diego event attracts the very best sand sculpting artists from around the world. Attendees can watch as the impressive sculptures seem to rise out the sand. In addition to the sand sculptures, many other pieces of art will be on display â€“ and for sale. Live music, beer and wine, and fabulous food make this a fun event for the whole family.
San Diego Film Festival
September 30 through October 4, 2015
More than 100 films will be screened during this 5-day San Diego event. The San Diego Film Festival also includes parties, VIP events, industry panels, and more. Those wishing to attend can purchase individual screening tickets, a ticket bundle, or one of the VIP pass options that include all screenings as well as access to parties and other special events.
Festival of Sail
September 5 through September 7, 2015
Maritime Museum San Diego | 1492 North Harbor Drive San Diego, CA 92101
The Festival of Sail is the largest such event on the entire West Coast. The event starts with the Parade of Sail and includes many activities for the whole family. Admission to the event is $7 for adults and $5 for children ages 3 to 12. Tickets for special activities, such as twilight sails, and the opportunity to board some of the ships, are also available.
Source: San Diego Hotels
